SELECT u.name,d.simple_name,e.score,e.create_time,e.exam_type FROM work_exam_history e LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_id = e.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.dept_id where u.status != 'DELETED'
and (u.phone like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') or u.account like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') or u.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%'))
and (d.dept_id = #{deptId} or d.dept_id in ( select p.dept_id from sys_dept p where p.pids like CONCAT('%$[', #{deptId}, '$]%') escape '$' ))
and (e.create_time between CONCAT(#{beginTime},' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(#{endTime},' 23:59:59'))
ORDER BY e.create_time desc
